attributes.action: Next Prime Minister to call a general election: EU relationship
attributes.additional_details: This country is divided. Voters on both sides of the referendum debate feel betrayed by the outcome and the resulting infighting and U-turns on claims.  The only way forward is to continue democratically.  If there is a proposal for a plan on our relationship with the EU, it needs to be decided on democratically by the populace. It must NOT be decided by one political party behind closed doors. The safety, security, economy and future of this country is at stake.  The people must have a say.
attributes.background: The next steps of the UK's relationship with the EU must be decided on democratically.
